sources.title: Terror Island
sources.description: A man is held captive by island natives who believe that his daughter has stolen a pearl belonging to their idol. This is a five reel truncated 1922 Realart print of the Houdini mystery missing a large chunk from the middle of this originally seven reel production.

metadata.Plot: An inventor travels to the South Seas, where there is buried treasure belonging to a girl. The girl's father is being held captive by cannibals until she returns a pearl that belongs to one of their idols.
metadata.Writer: Arthur B. Reeve, John Grey, Walter Woods
metadata.Actors: Harry Houdini, Jack Brammall, Lila Lee
